p_str: SELECT rank ,  company ,  market_1 FROM company WHERE main_industry  =  'Banking' ORDER BY sales_billion ,  profits_billion
g_str: SELECT rank ,  company ,  market_value FROM company WHERE main_industry  =  'Banking' ORDER BY sales_billion ,  profits_billion

p_str: SELECT min(market_1) ,  max(market_1) ,  avg(market_1) FROM company
g_str: SELECT min(market_value) ,  max(market_value) ,  avg(market_value) FROM company
